about_the_game:
The main character is a normal girl named "Suzuki Rika"

living a dull and peaceful life.

One day, she was reading an article about Exhibitionism in an SM magazine in a convenience store.

After being affected, she also began to imitate and expose herself.

At first, it was just a slight exhibiting play by taking off her miniskirt and

go out with only panties and leggings under a hoody.

“How about trying something more exciting?” She asked herself.

Then she tries going out without leggings, after that, even without panties,

and eventually, she wears nothing but a hoody.

She soon gets the shameful pleasure of exposing herself,

and such behavior gradually escalates.

It's PM 21:10

Rika just woke up from a nap, and the long and trembling night is about to begin……

  • Room: Make sure of your appearance before going out.

  • Residential area: The streets that were once ordinary become dangerous areas due to different clothing.

  • Utility pole: Stand under a street lamp, illuminated by weak light, and continue forward.

  • Convenience store: Bright and tidy store. Perhaps there are adult magazines in the magazine section...?

  • Vending machine: Squatting in front of a brightly lit vending machine to pee.

  • Apartment: Masturbating in front of the entrance to an apartment rented by unscrupulous men.

  • Park: Using the monkey bars and a forgotten jump rope, engage in self-restraint play.

  • Park toliet: Masturbating naked in a male restroom stall entered to avoid detection.

  • Mansion: Dangerous even if just staying naked in the wide lobby corridor, with maximum danger.

  • Elevator: Riding the elevator completely naked, forcibly moving without knowing the situation outside, with no escape, an absolutely hopeless environment.

  • Delusion: Fantasizing about exhibitionism acts that cannot be realized, which may also affect reality...

The city, as the main stage of this game, contains a total of 10 areas.

Rika will slowly try to masturbate in various places, and she can be seen masturbating in different positions in different places.

Her fate is at your will. There are options such as “Escape” and “Stay” for you to choose from.

No matter what decision you make in these various events, the wheel is in your hands……

But of course, if you are caught, you will experience the “Cost.”

  • (1)Rika is fully dubbed.

  • (2) "Escape?!" "Stay!?" There are several scenes in the game where you must make choices.
    Your hands will determine Rika's fate.
    If you make the wrong choice... you will personally experience the consequences of exhibitionism play through her body.

  • (3) There are no troublesome elements such as battle scenes or accumulating experience points.
    Enjoy a relaxing experience of the story.

  • (4)CG Viewing & Event Replay Mode
    You can replay any H events you have seen at any time.

content_descriptors.notes: "Night Stroll" contains sexual acts, nudity, exhibitionism, non-consensual sex, rape, etc. and is not suitable for all ages. The characters in the story are over 20 years old.

name: Night Stroll

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: An ordinary girl named "Suzuki Rika" who can be found anywhere. It all started with an adult magazine, and the exhibitionism play began. From not wearing skirts to walking around completely naked, experiencing the pleasure of shame through exhibitionism.
supported_languages:
Japanese*, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
